tasks: Study of supersymmetric scale-separated AdS3 flux vacua of massive IIA on G2 orbifolds with smeared orientifold planes
results: Integer dual dimensions for the operators corresponding to the closed string scalar fields in the dual CFT
title: Integer Dual Dimensions in Scale-Separated AdS_3 from Massive IIA.pdf
abstract: We study supersymmetric scale-separated AdS3 ﬂux vacua of massive IIA on G2 orbifolds with smeared orientifold planes. We consider two types of T 7/Z3 2 orbifolds which, with appro- priate ﬂux choices, yield integer dual dimensions for the operators corresponding to the closed string scalar ﬁelds in the dual CFT.
